title: Yamazaki Home Sink Removeable Drainer Tray, Kitchen Drying Organizer Holder, One Size, White Steel + Wood | Dish Rack
features: AUTHENTICITY: All our products are designed by our in-house team in our headquarters in Nara, Japan. To ensure the authenticity of our products, we recommend purchasing from these sellers: Yamazaki Home, Amazon.com, Red Cat, Sportique, or Sunrise Image. There are no other authorized resellers on Amazon.

DISH DRAINER WITH TRAY: The rare drying rack that looks great next to any kitchen sink. One of our most popular and defining items, the lightweight, coated-steel frame provides durability and a sleek, attractive silhouette. Get this essential space saver for easy access throughout the day.
MODERN DESIGN: Drainer tray and cutlery holder are included and are both made from plastic. Get this essential space saver for easy access throughout the day.
FUNCTIONAL: The wood-accent handles, a signature of our Tosca product line, provides a touch of warmth and makes moving the dish drainer around the kitchen easy.
MATERIALS: The rack is made of sleek, powder-coated metal steel. The wooden handles are made from ash wood and the tray and utensil holder are both made from ABS resin.
DIMENSIONS AND WEIGHT: This product is 13.19 x 18.5 x 7.87 inches (L x W x H) and weighs 4.08 pounds.

COLLECTION: Meet Tosca, our collection of Scandinavian-inspired storage essentials in enticing white steel with modern wooden accents. One of our most style-forward lines, these home accessories are stylish and chic, a hit with our customers. True to the Yamazaki brand, these products are designed to offer solutions as well as sophistication for every room in the house.

BRAND: Inspired by “small-space living” in Japan, Yamazaki creates truly unique, ultramodern products that are mindfully designed to make incremental improvements throughout the home and elevate quality of life. Yamazaki. Home, simplified.
description: The wood-accent handles, a signature of our Tosca product line, provides a touch of warmth and makes moving the dish drainer around the kitchen easy. The utensil holder hangs on the edge of the rack, allowing it to be placed on anywhere. Both the holder and easy-to-clean base tray are made from plastic.
